The Order Management module is thoughtful developed for a seamless tracking of orders. The Vendors can view the recent orders on their online store. You can update the order status, say, preparing to dispatch, ready to dispatch, dispatched and so on. You can also add a new delivery staff and update the delivery statuses to your Customer.
